title: Cadena, by Miguel Hernandez
content:
’ [Cadena](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906124952/http:/www.latinotype.com/espanol/fonts/CadenaBlack/index.html)’ is a lovely new type family, currently in progress, by Miguel Hernández _( [Latinotype](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906124952/http:/www.latinotype.com/))_. A specially offered prelease of ’Cadena _(Black)_’ is available through [Miguel’s Flickr page](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906124952/http:/www.flickr.com/photos/miguel_hernandez/), for only $5, to support the further development of the entire ’Cadena’ range. A highly recommended purchase. ;)

[www.latinotype.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906124952/http:/www.latinotype.com/)  
 [flickr.com/photos/miguel\_hernandez/](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906124952/http:/www.flickr.com/photos/miguel_hernandez/)  
 [typophile.com/user/1109](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906124952/http:/www.typophile.com/user/1109)
author: formlos
